summary: Web app with vibrant color scheme, animations, hero section, testimonials, countdown timer, image carousel, smooth scroll, and Internet Identity login. Pricing tier fix needed.
known_issues: Elite tier price incorrectly set; should be $99

existing_features.title: Update the Elite tier price display on the PricingPage to show $99 (per month) instead of the current incorrect price.

new_feature_requests.summary: Ensure the Elite tier price in the backend (if stored or referenced in main.mo, e.g. for Stripe checkout amount or plan metadata) reflects $99.
